languages.text: "Чую скверну. Много грязной скверны". {n}Ульфар свирепо взирает на побоище.{/n} "Их убивали не по нужде или делу. Для радости. Я знаю, как выглядят тела тех, кого ты прикончил с наслаждением — именно так".

"I smell corruption. A great deal of foul corruption." {n}Ulfar stares fiercely at the carnage.{/n} "They were killed not for need or cause, but for pleasure. I know what bodies look like when someone revelled in the slaughter — they look like this."
languages.original_text: "Чую скверну. Много грязной скверны". {n}Ульфар свирепо взирает на побоище.{/n} "Их убивали не по нужде или делу. Для радости. Я знаю, как выглядят тела тех, кого ты прикончил с наслаждением — именно так".

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「臭うな。鼻についてしかたがない腐臭だ。」{n}ウルファーはこの大虐殺をすさまじい目つきで眺めている。{/n}「必要も理由もなく、享楽のためだけに殺されてやがる。喜んで皆殺しをする奴にやられたような死体を知ってるが…こいつはそっくりだ」
languages.original_text: "I smell corruption. A great deal of foul corruption." {n}Ulfar stares fiercely at the carnage.{/n} "They were killed not for need or cause, but for pleasure. I know what bodies look like when someone revelled in the slaughter — they look like this."

traits.locale_text: 「臭うな。鼻についてしかたがない腐臭だ。」{n}ウルファーはこの大虐殺をすさまじい目つきで眺めている。{/n}「必要も理由もなく、享楽のためだけに殺されてやがる。喜んで皆殺しをする奴にやられたような死体を知ってるが…こいつはそっくりだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我嗅到了腐化的气息。非常严重的邪恶腐化。”{n}乌尔法怒视着屠杀现场。{/n}“他们杀死这些人既非必要，也无目的，只是为了寻欢作乐。我见过杀戮成瘾之人凌虐过后的尸体，就是这幅模样。”
languages.original_text: "I smell corruption. A great deal of foul corruption." {n}Ulfar stares fiercely at the carnage.{/n} "They were killed not for need or cause, but for pleasure. I know what bodies look like when someone revelled in the slaughter — they look like this."

traits.locale_text: “我嗅到了腐化的气息。非常严重的邪恶腐化。”{n}乌尔法怒视着屠杀现场。{/n}“他们杀死这些人既非必要，也无目的，只是为了寻欢作乐。我见过杀戮成瘾之人凌虐过后的尸体，就是这幅模样。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je perçois l'odeur de la corruption... D'une corruption immense, {n}déclare Ulfar en observant le carnage.{/n} Ils n'ont pas été tués par nécessité ni pour une cause, mais par plaisir. Je sais à quoi ressemble un cadavre lorsque son bourreau s'est délecté du massacre. Il ressemble à ça. »
languages.original_text: "I smell corruption. A great deal of foul corruption." {n}Ulfar stares fiercely at the carnage.{/n} "They were killed not for need or cause, but for pleasure. I know what bodies look like when someone revelled in the slaughter — they look like this."

traits.locale_text: « Je perçois l'odeur de la corruption... D'une corruption immense, {n}déclare Ulfar en observant le carnage.{/n} Ils n'ont pas été tués par nécessité ni pour une cause, mais par plaisir. Je sais à quoi ressemble un cadavre lorsque son bourreau s'est délecté du massacre. Il ressemble à ça. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Huelo corrupción. En unas cantidades ingentes». {n}Ulfar mira ferozmente la carnicería.{/n} «No los han matado por algún motivo o necesidad, sino por placer. Conozco bien el aspecto que tienen los cadáveres que deja alguien que se recrea en la masacre. Y es este».
languages.original_text: "I smell corruption. A great deal of foul corruption." {n}Ulfar stares fiercely at the carnage.{/n} "They were killed not for need or cause, but for pleasure. I know what bodies look like when someone revelled in the slaughter — they look like this."

traits.locale_text: «Huelo corrupción. En unas cantidades ingentes». {n}Ulfar mira ferozmente la carnicería.{/n} «No los han matado por algún motivo o necesidad, sino por placer. Conozco bien el aspecto que tienen los cadáveres que deja alguien que se recrea en la masacre. Y es este».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich rieche Verderbnis. Jede Menge stinkende Verderbnis." {n}Ulfar starrt grimmig auf das Massaker.{/n} "Sie wurden nicht aus Not getötet, sondern aus purem Vergnügen. Ich weiß, wie Leichen aussehen, wenn jemand gerne schlachtet ... genau so."
languages.original_text: "I smell corruption. A great deal of foul corruption." {n}Ulfar stares fiercely at the carnage.{/n} "They were killed not for need or cause, but for pleasure. I know what bodies look like when someone revelled in the slaughter — they look like this."

traits.locale_text: "Ich rieche Verderbnis. Jede Menge stinkende Verderbnis." {n}Ulfar starrt grimmig auf das Massaker.{/n} "Sie wurden nicht aus Not getötet, sondern aus purem Vergnügen. Ich weiß, wie Leichen aussehen, wenn jemand gerne schlachtet ... genau so."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Burnuma yozlaşma kokuları geliyor. Hem de azımsanmayacak kadar habis bir yozlaşma." {n}Ulfar, sinirle katliama bakıyor.{/n} "Ne bir ihtiyaç ne de bir nedenden dolayı öldürüldüler. Sadece zevkine can verdiler. Birileri katliamdan haz aldığında cesetlerin nasıl göründüğünü bilirim. Böyle görünürler."
languages.original_text: "I smell corruption. A great deal of foul corruption." {n}Ulfar stares fiercely at the carnage.{/n} "They were killed not for need or cause, but for pleasure. I know what bodies look like when someone revelled in the slaughter — they look like this."
